author: caretaker
notes: Codex §24 + Experiment Design Guide compliance; macro runs logged for CELLWORLD_L3_FLOWFIELD_A, CODEWORLD_L3_RESERVOIR_A, MIRRORWORLD_L4_SYMBOLIC_A.

status_history.notes: GPU slot request resent with drought/flood preset + JOY/KINSHIP metrics.

trials.Purpose: Grow JOY/KINSHIP/SEASON_RESILIENCE by alternating drought/flood macro drivers.
trials.Method: Follow CELLWORLD_DROUGHT_FLOOD_PRESET, drive flow_field with alternating drought/flood toggles each macro tick, log JOY_GATHERING + season text episodes.
trials.Observations: Dry-run analytics from JOY_GATHERING episodes produced JOY=0.95, KINSHIP=0.73 (29 actors / 40 norm), SEASON_RESILIENCE=0.50 via famine/flood sentence coverage.
trials.Integration: Hold lab slot until GPU confirmed, then execute 4,000 macro ticks × 20 seeds with drought/flood preset and upload JOY/KINSHIP deltas per macro decade.

execution_evidence.macro_run_summary: Caretaker dry-run on 2 macro toggles validated JOY/KINSHIP metrics prior to lab execution.

trials.adult_readiness_notes: Resonance 0.53 < 0.75; drought/flood macro ticks pending lab run.

trials.Purpose: Use reservoir_mesh macro body to raise CAUSAL_CLARITY/RIGOR via sprint-scale release events.
trials.Method: Convert release JSONL into 20-seed macro schedule (World.set_time_scale(sprint_weeks=2)), feed CodeEpisode+CausalEpisode pairs as driver for 26,000 macro ticks.
trials.Observations: Pilot ingestion produced feature/bugfix/refactor trio (CAUSAL_CLARITY 0.67, RIGOR 0.33, CARETAKER_CONFIDENCE 0.33) and caretaker resonance 0.54.
trials.Integration: Send ready bundle to lab tier to replay across 20 seeds; attach causal episode snapshots every 100 macro years.

execution_evidence.macro_run_summary: Release-log → causal episodes conversion validated pipeline on 3 sprint macro ticks (pilot seed).

status_history.notes: Self-writing + caretaker feedback + language field + observer packet assembled.

trials.Purpose: Test symbolic_lattice macro growth for JOY/CARE/SELF_DISCLOSURE with transformer_tutor observer.
trials.Method: Run weekly macro ticks via scripts/elysia_self_writing.py, scripts/elysia_caretaker.py, scripts/elysia_language_field.py, package outputs with scripts/mirrorworld_observer_packet.py before lab tutor replay.
trials.Observations: 64 caretaker-run macro ticks yielded JOY intensity 0.95, CARE 1.0 (every caretaker prompt invited creation), SELF_DISCLOSURE 0.99 (avg 596-char entries).
trials.Integration: Deliver observer packet to lab tutor; expand to 20 seeds and capture tutor resonance metrics + symbol/text episode deltas per macro year.

execution_evidence.macro_run_summary: Caretaker executed 64 weekly macro ticks (4 seeds) and produced observer packet for tutor handoff.

trials.adult_readiness_notes: Caretaker resonance 0.65 < 0.75; need tutor diversity metrics before adult claim.
